## hasGreenChannel() function

Check if a given texture format contains a green channel.

**Signature:**

```typescript
declare function hasGreenChannel(format: TextureFormat): boolean;
```

## Parameters

<table><thead><tr><th>

Parameter


</th><th>

Type


</th><th>

Description


</th></tr></thead>
<tbody><tr><td>

format


</td><td>

[TextureFormat](doc/markdown/./device.textureformat.md)


</td><td>

The texture format to be checked.


</td></tr>
</tbody></table>

**Returns:**

boolean

true if the texture format contains a green channel, otherwise false
